pages.title: Useful Curses
pages.text: $(thing)Curse Enchantments$() now have some uses:$(li)A $(item)Pumpkin$() with $(thing)Curse of Vanishing$() will not obstruct your vision.$(li)A named $(item)Player Head$() enchanted with $(thing)Curse of Binding$() will show the full model of that player when placed on an $(item)Armor Stand$().
